name: I'm A Hero I Guess...
description:
All of the heroes of earth are off-planet fighting Grulthra, which gives small time villains a chance at taking over the world! It's time to be a hero!...sort of...

Suit up with your mom's crocs, some booty shorts or even a bucket with two holes for your eyes! This game is about improvised hero comedy: trying to stop evil doers without a billion dollars or superpowers...what could go wrong?

A simplistic system for one-shot comedy roleplaying games.

Feedback on this project is greatly appreciated and I look forward to hearing how sessions went in the comment section bellow!
